transArray.content: The night with stars will not be dark, the sea with sky will be blue, the life with dreams will be full of sunshine, and with your days, our work will be more meaningful. Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. However, in order to get your full score, it proves that we still have shortcomings. We hope that you can see our efforts next time you stay. We will continue to work hard to provide you with more For a comfortable and convenient check-in experience, all the hotel staff look forward to meeting you every time and wish you success in your work! General Manager: Li Changxia
